conbody.p: Finally, we are ready to apply the finishing touches to our module. In the example below, the Address and Phone boxes are not aligned. Although they are both contained in horizontal boxes, these boxes are positioned centrally on the vertical axis by default.
By applying finishing touches to set the vertical alignment of the Phone section to the top, we achieved an esthetically pleasing appearance for the boxes.

Furthermore, we can add more finishing touches by increasing the text area to four rows and then, adding the Save and Cancel buttons to the right of the page by using a glue. Finally, we set the border property of the different container boxes to clearly distinguish between the different groups of fields.
